mapper.sql: rno, diary_num, mem_id, diary_content, diary_date, diary_updatedate, diary_status
diary_num, mem_id, diary_content, diary_date, diary_updatedate, diary_status
mapper.select: select from (select @rownum:= @rownum+1 as rno, diary_table.* from diary_table, (select @rownum :=0 )a where mem_id=#{mem_id} and diary_status ='N' order by diary_date)sub order by sub.rno desc limit 5
mapper.insert: insert into diary_table values(diary_num, #{mem_id}, #{diary_content}, now(), now(), 'N')
mapper.update: update diary_table set diary_content=#{diary_content}, diary_updatedate=now() where diary_num=#{diary_num}
